title: Interpreting a signaling pathway Set member 2

content.question: Which of the following best describes the effect of insulin binding to the receptor on the osteoblast cells?

choices.label: Insulin binding ultimately increases pancreatic secretion of additional insulin.
Insulin binding blocks the release of osteocalcin from the osteoblasts.
Insulin binding inhibits the expression of <math alttext="E s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>E</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
Insulin binding increases the <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of the extracellular matrix.

content.answer: Insulin binding ultimately increases pancreatic secretion of additional insulin.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
